1.title: A Day to Remember

episode of.title: Royal Wedding of a Lifetime (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: It's the wedding the whole world's been waiting for--and now we're inviting YOU to join William and Kate on the happiest day of their lives. With the help of our Royal experts, top wedding organizers and celebrity commentators, we're going to imagine the joyous occasion in all its finery--from the second the future king and queen wake up on the big day to the moment they finally tie the knot.

2.title: A Tale of Two Princesses

episode of.title: Royal Wedding of a Lifetime (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Catherine Elizabeth Middleton will be following in Diana's footsteps to become the next People's Princess when she marries into the British Royal Family. The parallels between the two women are clear, and it's both symbolic and significant that William gave his bride his mother's engagement ring.

3.title: Kate's Gown of Renown

episode of.title: Royal Wedding of a Lifetime (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Choosing a wedding dress is the ultimate fantasy for any girl planning their fairytale wedding. But how do you choose a dress fit for a princess? We're going on a fairytale journey into Kate's most important wedding decision: her wedding dress. We'll speak to some of the world's hottest fashion houses to get their views and critique some of the most famous bridal gowns in royal wedding history.

4.title: Feast Fit for a Prince & Princess

episode of.title: Royal Wedding of a Lifetime (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Royal experts, celebrity chefs, master caterers and bakers are taking us on a delicious journey into the world of mouth watering cakes and foods fit for a future king, to see what we can expect on the menu of this very Royal wedding. If past Royal wedding cakes are anything to go by, Kate and Will have a lot to live up to. So we're going to countdown the top 10 Royal wedding cakes of all time.

5.title: William & Kate: A Love Story

episode of.title: Royal Wedding of a Lifetime (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: It sounds like the plot of a romance novel: she was an ordinary girl from a sleepy English village; he was the most eligible bachelor of his generation. But in a real life love-conquers-all tale, we'll soon witness the marriage of Kate Middleton to the future King of England. This episode will reveal the love story behind the wedding that will win the hearts of the entire world.

6.title: The Future King & Queen

episode of.title: Royal Wedding of a Lifetime (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Prince William and his glamorous new bride have their whole lives to look forward to. With the help of our team of experts, we'll gaze into our royal crystal ball to see how their real life fairytale will unfold. Like most newlyweds, Will and Kate will be setting up home, but unlike mere mortals they'll be house-hunting for palaces!

plot: The story of the romance between Prince William of Wales and Kate Middleton, leading up to their wedding, is told.::Anonymous
